reviewText: Worst video I ever bought and I have bought a lot of them. The language translation was bad an I could not follow it. Threw it away.
Bought this a couple of months ago, just now tried it ( I was healing from a knee injury). The product does not work.
The DVD didn't work. Too much work to send it back for a $10 DVD.
nothing clearly stated that was in german.  I could not get it to play on my dvd player.

Wish I had seen the other review before I purchased this.  It is in German, you can select English in the beginning but it is dubbed in English over the German talking.  Waste of money, I won't be using this!

I do not recommend this!!
Need to tell people it's not fro USA hard to follow waste of money would not recommend  do not buy
